• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with real-time networking, inventory systems, and procedurally generated worlds.
  • Features include vehicle controls, resource collection, building mechanics, and a shop system for upgrades and items.
  • Supports both desktop and mobile controls, with responsive UI and touch-optimized gameplay.
  • Includes cloud save functionality, admin controls, and chat system for multiplayer interaction.
    const TILE_PROPS = { [TILE_TYPES.COAL]: { name: "Coal", color: '#2c3e50', hardness: 2, value: 10, tier: 0, trashExclude: true },
    const CONSTANTS = { TILE_SIZE: 32, CHUNK_SIZE: 16, SPEED_NORMAL: 1.75, SPEED_DRILL: 0.75, FUEL_CONSUMPTION: 0.125 };

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time networking, procedurally generated worlds, and extensive crafting systems. Players can mine resources, build structures, upgrade equipment, and interact with others through chat and trading. The game supports both desktop and mobile controls with responsive UI design, includes cloud save functionality, and offers admin controls for server management.
